item.title: Whats code to search to change max combat level.. lol i forgot some1 pls post
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

Find this and replace it with this one.

	public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
		int points = 0;
		int output = 0;

		for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) {
			points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
			output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
			if (output >= exp) {
				return lvl;
			}
		}
		return 135;
	}

Read full topic
